vlive.korean: 그런 것도 있었어요 - 귀찮아 - 근데 왜 이렇게 귀찮게 해요? I saw that one. - Too tired. - Why do you go through all that? 듣기 View video iKON : [Replay] iKON ‘i DECIDE’ COUNTDOWN LIVE
vlive.english: I saw that one. - Too tired. - Why do you go through all that?

vlive.korean: 적어도 그만하라고 하면 알아듣고 귀찮게 하지 말아야 하지 않나? I said stop, then don't you have to stop bothering me? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 나는 누구를 좋아하는 걸까 [연애미수] EP04
vlive.english: I said stop, then don't you have to stop bothering me?

vlive.korean: [이제는 화이트 산타인지] 아니면 나 귀찮게 만들어야 하는 나쁜 지령인 거야? [So confused which one is ...] Or is it a bad mission to annoy me, following me? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.26 SSS #2 (SVT SECRET SANTA #2)
vlive.english: [So confused which one is ...] Or is it a bad mission to annoy me, following me?

vlive.korean: 나 아침이 귀찮게 안 하는데... I don't bother Ahchim... 듣기 View video 초등학생 관심거리연구소 (Super Cool Kids Lab) : [시즌4 댄스넘버피프틴]_EP.08 | 이렇게 못생길수도(예쁠수도)있나 싶어서
[엉겨 붙기] 아 왜 이렇게 귀찮게 해! Ah, why are you annoying me? 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [MMMTV4] EP36 LET'S GOGOBEBE part.2
vlive.english: Ah, why are you annoying me?

examples.korean: He rushed into the room without troubling to knock. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 귀찮게 노크 같은 건 하지 않고 방 안으로 뛰어 들어갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He rushed into the room without troubling to knock. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I didn’t like to disturb you. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신을 귀찮게 하고 싶지 않았어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I didn’t like to disturb you. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Let me know if he bothers you again. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 또 다시 널 귀찮게 하면 나한테 말 해. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Let me know if he bothers you again. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He swatted a fly that was annoying him. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 자기를 귀찮게 하던 파리를 찰싹 쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He swatted a fly that was annoying him. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Sorry to inflict myself on you again like this! 듣기 Add to Wordbook (제가 당신을) 또 이렇게 귀찮게 해서 미안해요! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Sorry to inflict myself on you again like this! Add to Wordbook
